        Joins the given string with the given separator in between.
        Parameters:

        elements - elements to be joined
        Returns:

      • findIndex

        public static int findIndex(String key,
                            Collection<String> coll,
                            boolean ignoreCase)
        Finds the position of the given key in the given collection. The position is defined as the iteration order of the collection.
        Parameters:
        coll - collection of string
        key - the string to search for
        ignoreCase - if true, string elements are compared ignoring case
        Returns:
        0-based index of the key in the given collection. -1 if key is not found.

        public static Map<String,?> makeMapIgnoreCase(Map<String,?> map)
        Convert all keys of the map to lower case such that keys will match ignoring case.
        Parameters:
        map - any map with String keys
        Returns:
        similar map but with lower case keys
